original_title: Girls Gone Bad II: The Breakout
overview: Life was sweet for warden Sharon Kane and her "Head Dyke" Raven Richards... for a permanent stable of caged women burning with desire! "The Breakout" threatens to blow the lid off! Three of the sexiest inmates crash the prison wall, burning with desire and desperate to be free! Will they find the freedom they so desperately desire or will they be captured and sent back to Warden Kane for punishment? The story continues...
title: Girls Gone Bad II: The Breakout
